channel.title: Bumpy ride
channel.description:
So I have been digging out this mountain in minecraft and created a aqueduct system for me to throw the dirt sand gravel from the top to my house area where the chests are (because hate to destroy anything) its been working great the blocks pool at the end with no problem. I tried today multiple times to use a boat on the waterway and it gets destroyed on the small bumps in the water. I can't seem to remove the bumps anyone have a trick?
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2cs80ly.jpg[/img]

item.title: Bumpy ride
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Since the water is already sloped, just destroy the bumps completely. The water will stay in its shape.

Read full topic

item.title: Bumpy ride
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:1, topic:385176”]So I have been digging out this mountain in minecraft and created a aqueduct system for me to throw the dirt sand gravel from the top to my house area where the chests are (because hate to destroy anything) its been working great the blocks pool at the end with no problem. I tried today multiple times to use a boat on the waterway and it gets destroyed on the small bumps in the water. I can’t seem to remove the bumps anyone have a trick?

2cs80ly.jpg856×479
[/quote]
I don’t understand. Are you trying to move at the direction you’re facing, or the other direction?

Read full topic

item.title: Bumpy ride
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Remove the stones and put stairs. It could do the trick. Or try to put a railway.

Read full topic
